item.title: ParÂ : Anna Cheung
item.dc:creator: Anna Cheung
item.description:
Bonjour, Cyril et Valerie,
We met on the Sea Spirit and I have to say, your photos are absolutely amazing! I will need to run your commentary through Google translate to understand where these fabulous places you have visited since Antarctica are located.
Take care and safe travels.
Anna
item.content:encoded:
Bonjour, Cyril et Valerie,

We met on the Sea Spirit and I have to say, your photos are absolutely amazing! I will need to run your commentary through Google translate to understand where these fabulous places you have visited since Antarctica are located.

Take care and safe travels.

Anna
